Description: An example resource that creates an Azure Storage account along with a Blob container.
Schema: {"typeName":"POC::Azure::BlobStorage","description":"An example resource that creates an Azure Storage account along with a Blob container.","properties":{"AzureSubscriptionId":{"description":"Subscription ID of the Azure Account.","type":"string"},"AzureClientId":{"description":"App ID CloudFormation will use to access Azure.","type":"string"},"AzureTenantId":{"description":"Directory ID CloudFormation will use to access Azure.","type":"string"},"AzureClientSecret":{"description":"Client credentials CloudFormation will use to authenticate to Azure and access services.","type":"string"},"AzureResourceGroup":{"description":"Name of the Resource Group created by CloudFormation.","type":"string"},"AzureBlobStorageAccountName":{"description":"Name of the Blob Storage account created by CloudFormation.","type":"string"},"AzureBlobContainerUrl":{"description":"Url of the Blob container created by CloudFormation.","type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["AzureSubscriptionId","AzureClientId","AzureTenantId","AzureClientSecret"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/AzureBlobStorageAccountName","/properties/AzureBlobContainerUrl","/properties/AzureResourceGroup"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/AzureBlobContainerUrl"],"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":[]},"read":{"permissions":[]},"delete":{"permissions":[]}}}
